verses.text: Moreover the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came unto me, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

Also, thou \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd* unto the \w land|strong="H0127"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; An \w end|strong="H7093"\w*, the \w end|strong="H7093"\w* is \w come|strong="H0935"\w* upon the \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w corners|strong="H3671"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.

Now \add is\add* the \w end|strong="H7093"\w* \add come\add* upon thee, and I will \w send|strong="H7971"\w* mine \w anger|strong="H0639"\w* upon thee, and will \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* thee according to thy \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*, and will \w recompense|strong="H5414"\w* upon thee all thine \w abominations|strong="H8441"\w*.\f + \fr 7.3 \ft recompense: Heb. give\f*

And mine \w eye|strong="H5869"\w* shall not \w spare|strong="H2347"\w* thee, neither will I have \w pity|strong="H2550"\w*: but I will \w recompense|strong="H5414"\w* thy \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* upon thee, and thine \w abominations|strong="H8441"\w* shall be in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of thee: and ye shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; An \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*, an \w only|strong="H0259"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*, behold, is \w come|strong="H0935"\w*.

An \w end|strong="H7093"\w* is \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, the \w end|strong="H7093"\w* is \w come|strong="H0935"\w*: it \w watcheth|strong="H6974"\w* for thee; behold, it is \w come|strong="H0935"\w*.\f + \fr 7.6 \ft watcheth for: Heb. awaketh against\f*

The \w morning|strong="H6843"\w* is \w come|strong="H0935"\w* unto thee, O thou that \w dwellest|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*: the \w time|strong="H6256"\w* is \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of \w trouble|strong="H4103"\w* \add is\add* \w near|strong="H7138"\w*, and not the sounding \w again|strong="H1906"\w* of the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*.\f + \fr 7.7 \ft sounding…: or, echo\f*

Now will I \w shortly|strong="H7138"\w* pour \w out|strong="H8210"\w* my \w fury|strong="H2534"\w* upon thee, and \w accomplish|strong="H3615"\w* mine \w anger|strong="H0639"\w* upon thee: and I will \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* thee according to thy \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*, and will \w recompense|strong="H5414"\w* thee for all thine \w abominations|strong="H8441"\w*.

And mine \w eye|strong="H5869"\w* shall not \w spare|strong="H2347"\w*, neither will I have \w pity|strong="H2550"\w*: I will \w recompense|strong="H5414"\w* thee according to thy \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* and thine \w abominations|strong="H8441"\w* \add that\add* are in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of thee; and ye shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* that \w smiteth|strong="H5221"\w*.\f + \fr 7.9 \ft thee according: Heb. upon thee, etc\f*

Behold the \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, behold, it is \w come|strong="H0935"\w*: the \w morning|strong="H6843"\w* is gone \w forth|strong="H3318"\w*; the \w rod|strong="H4294"\w* hath \w blossomed|strong="H6692"\w*, \w pride|strong="H2087"\w* hath \w budded|strong="H6524"\w*.

\w Violence|strong="H2555"\w* is risen \w up|strong="H6965"\w* into a \w rod|strong="H4294"\w* of \w wickedness|strong="H7562"\w*: none of them \add shall remain\add*, nor of their \w multitude|strong="H1995"\w*, nor of \w any|strong="H1991"\w* of theirs: neither \add shall there be\add* \w wailing|strong="H5089"\w* for them.\f + \fr 7.11 \ft theirs: or, their tumultuous persons: Heb. tumult\f*

The \w time|strong="H6256"\w* is \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* draweth \w near|strong="H5060"\w*: let not the \w buyer|strong="H7069"\w* \w rejoice|strong="H8055"\w*, nor the \w seller|strong="H4376"\w* \w mourn|strong="H0056"\w*: for \w wrath|strong="H2740"\w* \add is\add* upon all the \w multitude|strong="H1995"\w* thereof.

For the \w seller|strong="H4376"\w* shall not \w return|strong="H7725"\w* to that which is \w sold|strong="H4465"\w*, although they were yet \w alive|strong="H2416"\w*: for the \w vision|strong="H2377"\w* \add is\add* touching the whole \w multitude|strong="H1995"\w* thereof, \add which\add* shall not \w return|strong="H7725"\w*; neither shall \w any|strong="H0376"\w* \w strengthen|strong="H2388"\w* himself in the \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* of his \w life|strong="H2416"\w*.\f + \fr 7.13 \ft although they…: Heb. though their life were yet among the living\f*\f + \fr 7.13 \ft in the…: or, whose life is in his iniquity\f*\f + \fr 7.13 \ft the iniquity: Heb. his iniquity\f*

They have \w blown|strong="H8628"\w* the \w trumpet|strong="H8619"\w*, even to make all \w ready|strong="H3559"\w*; but none \w goeth|strong="H1980"\w* to the \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*: for my \w wrath|strong="H2740"\w* \add is\add* upon all the \w multitude|strong="H1995"\w* thereof.

The \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \add is\add* \w without|strong="H2351"\w*, and the \w pestilence|strong="H1698"\w* and the \w famine|strong="H7458"\w* \w within|strong="H1004"\w*: he that \add is\add* in the \w field|strong="H7704"\w* shall \w die|strong="H4191"\w* with the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*; and he that \add is\add* in the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, \w famine|strong="H7458"\w* and \w pestilence|strong="H1698"\w* shall \w devour|strong="H0398"\w* him.

¶ But they that \w escape|strong="H6403"\w* of them shall \w escape|strong="H6412"\w*, and shall be on the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* like \w doves|strong="H3123"\w* of the \w valleys|strong="H1516"\w*, all of them \w mourning|strong="H1993"\w*, every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* for his \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*.

All \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* shall be \w feeble|strong="H7503"\w*, and all \w knees|strong="H1290"\w* shall be \w weak|strong="H3212"\w* \add as\add* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*.\f + \fr 7.17 \ft be weak…: Heb. go into water\f*

They shall also \w gird|strong="H2296"\w* \add themselves\add* with \w sackcloth|strong="H8242"\w*, and \w horror|strong="H6427"\w* shall \w cover|strong="H3680"\w* them; and \w shame|strong="H0955"\w* \add shall be\add* upon all \w faces|strong="H6440"\w*, and \w baldness|strong="H7144"\w* upon all their \w heads|strong="H7218"\w*.

They shall \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* their \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* in the \w streets|strong="H2351"\w*, and their \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* shall be \w removed|strong="H5079"\w*: their \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* and their \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* shall not be \w able|strong="H3201"\w* to \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* them in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of the \w wrath|strong="H5678"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: they shall not \w satisfy|strong="H7646"\w* their \w souls|strong="H5315"\w*, neither \w fill|strong="H4390"\w* their \w bowels|strong="H4578"\w*: because it is the \w stumblingblock|strong="H4383"\w* of their \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*.\f + \fr 7.19 \ft removed: Heb. for a separation, or, uncleanness\f*\f + \fr 7.19 \ft it is…: or, their iniquity is their stumblingblock\f*

¶ As for the \w beauty|strong="H6643"\w* of his \w ornament|strong="H5716"\w*, he \w set|strong="H7760"\w* it in \w majesty|strong="H1347"\w*: but they \w made|strong="H6213"\w* the \w images|strong="H6754"\w* of their \w abominations|strong="H8441"\w* \add and\add* of their detestable \w things|strong="H8251"\w* therein: therefore have I \w set|strong="H5414"\w* it \w far|strong="H5079"\w* from them.\f + \fr 7.20 \ft set it far…: or, made it unto them an unclean thing\f*

And I will \w give|strong="H5414"\w* it into the \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w strangers|strong="H2114"\w* for a \w prey|strong="H0957"\w*, and to the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* for a \w spoil|strong="H7998"\w*; and they shall \w pollute|strong="H2490"\w* it.

My \w face|strong="H6440"\w* will I \w turn|strong="H5437"\w* also from them, and they shall \w pollute|strong="H2490"\w* my \w secret|strong="H6845"\w* \add place:\add* for the \w robbers|strong="H6530"\w* shall \w enter|strong="H0935"\w* into it, and \w defile|strong="H2490"\w* it.\f + \fr 7.22 \ft robbers: or, burglers\f*

¶ \w Make|strong="H6213"\w* a \w chain|strong="H7569"\w*: for the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* is \w full|strong="H4390"\w* of \w bloody|strong="H1818"\w* \w crimes|strong="H4941"\w*, and the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* is \w full|strong="H4390"\w* of \w violence|strong="H2555"\w*.

Wherefore I will \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* the \w worst|strong="H7451"\w* of the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w*, and they shall \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* their \w houses|strong="H1004"\w*: I will also make the \w pomp|strong="H1347"\w* of the \w strong|strong="H5794"\w* to \w cease|strong="H7673"\w*; and their holy \w places|strong="H6942"\w* shall be \w defiled|strong="H2490"\w*.\f + \fr 7.24 \ft their holy…: or, they shall inherit their holy places\f*

\w Destruction|strong="H7089"\w* \w cometh|strong="H0935"\w*; and they shall \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*, and \add there shall be\add* none.\f + \fr 7.25 \ft Destruction: Heb. Cutting off\f*

\w Mischief|strong="H1943"\w* shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* upon \w mischief|strong="H1943"\w*, and \w rumour|strong="H8052"\w* shall be upon \w rumour|strong="H8052"\w*; then shall they \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* a \w vision|strong="H2377"\w* of the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w*; but the \w law|strong="H8451"\w* shall \w perish|strong="H0006"\w* from the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, and \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w* from the \w ancients|strong="H2205"\w*.

The \w king|strong="H4428"\w* shall \w mourn|strong="H0056"\w*, and the \w prince|strong="H5387"\w* shall be \w clothed|strong="H3847"\w* with \w desolation|strong="H8077"\w*, and the \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* shall be \w troubled|strong="H0926"\w*: I will \w do|strong="H6213"\w* unto them after their \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, and according to their \w deserts|strong="H4941"\w* will I \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* them; and they shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 7.27 \ft according…: Heb. with their judgments\f*
